WEDDINGS

DON'T DO IT!

Indy Fresh is a full service catering company offering fresh, local and fabulous food at a smart price point. With our exclusive Fancy Fresh and Wedding Service, we hope to be the perfect fit for your big day. Indy Fresh Catering is the go-to caterer for any venue, rustic or refined. We have a full-service staff of seasoned professionals.

We will work with you to create a custom catering package that fits your wedding vision. To please everyone on your guest list, we specialize in Italian, comfort food and casual local barbecue. We offer budget friendly plastic ware, eco chic bamboo ware, faux china, and even the real breakable stuff, upon request.

WEDDING EVENTS

  • Wedding Parties
  • Rehearsal Dinners
  • Luncheons
  • Wedding Showers
  • Send-Off Brunches

WEDDING SERVICES

  • Snack Platters
  • Buffets
  • Tray Service
  • Personalized Bars
  • Station Service

At Indy Fresh, we know nothing can ruin the mood like a high price tag. We have a very efficient business model, which means we can pass the savings on to you. You can hit the dance floor happy knowing your guests are happy with an incredible meal at a smart price. We pride ourselves in no hidden costs. After all, entertaining is how make your guests feel, not what you spend.

Once we have a good idea of your vision and budget, we will send you a proposal. The proposal will include the food, flatware, linens for the buffet tables and any staff members dedicated to making your event special.

Testimonials

“If you’re looking for a caterer for an event look no further than Indy Fresh! We were amazed by the service we were provided! The entire staff we worked with was polite, professional, upbeat and I wouldn’t doubt my decision to use them for one second. Not to mention the food was delicious, we constantly received compliments on the food and how much people loved it. If I ever need a caterer in the future, I know who i’ll be using. Thank you Indy Fresh!”

— Brittney Dillingham, Bride 5/16/15
